casebody.data:
Russell PEELER
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 15, 2017

Lisa J. Steele, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Harry Weller, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Russell Peeler's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 654, 155 A.3d 772 (2017), is denied.
